teaser: Facebook's latest business results have the company and investors in high spirits today. Sales rose significantly and the mobile advertising efforts seem to be working.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 25, 2013
contentencoded:
Facebook's latest business results have the company and investors in high spirits. Sales rose significantly and the mobile advertising efforts seem to be working.

Seth Fiegerman, business reporter for Mashable, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
title: Facebook cheers mobile success
description: Facebook's latest business results have the company and investors in high spirits today. Sales rose significantly and the mobile advertising efforts seem to be working.
